00007 template <class T> class XVImageScalar;
00008 template <class T> class XVImageRGB;

00010 template<class T, class T1>
00011 XVImageScalar<T1> YUVtoScalar (const XVImageYUV<T> &image, 
00012                       XVImageScalar<T1> &targ) {
00013   
00014   targ.resize(image);
00015   XVImageWIterator<T1> ScIter(targ);
00016   XVImageIterator<T> YUVSiter(image);
00017   while (!YUVSiter.end()) {
00018     *ScIter = (*YUVSiter).Y();
00019   }
00020   
00021   return targ;  
00022 }
00023 
00024 template<class T, class T1>
00025 XVImageRGB<T1> YUVtoRGB (const XVImageYUV<T> &image, XVImageRGB<T1> &targ) {
00026 
00027   targ.resize(image);
00028   XVImageWIterator<T1> Itarg(targ);
00029   XVImageIterator<T> Iimage(image);
00030   unsigned char tempY;
00031   unsigned char tempU;
00032   unsigned char tempV;
00033   unsigned char pg;
00034 
00035   if(! bYUV2RGBTableBuilt ) buildYUV2RGBTable();
00036 
00037   for (;!Itarg.end();++Itarg,++Iimage) {
00038     tempY = Iimage->Y();
00039     tempU = Iimage->U();
00040     tempV = Iimage->V();
00041 
00042     pg =  TABLE_YUV_TO_PG[ tempU ][ tempV ] ;
00043     Itarg -> setR( TABLE_YUV_TO_R[ tempY ][ tempV ] );
00044     Itarg -> setB( TABLE_YUV_TO_B[ tempY ][ tempU ] );
00045     Itarg -> setG( TABLE_YUV_TO_G[ tempY ][ pg ] );
00046   }
00047 
00048   return targ;
00049 }
00050 
00051 template<class T, class T1>
00052 XVImageYUV<T1> RGBtoYUV (const XVImageRGB<T> &image, XVImageYUV<T1> &targ) {
00053 
00054   targ.resize(image);
00055   XVImageWIterator<T1> Itarg(targ);
00056   XVImageIterator<T> Iimage(image);
00057   unsigned char tempR;
00058   unsigned char tempG;
00059   unsigned char tempB;
00060   unsigned char py;
00061   unsigned char y;
00062  
00063   if(! bRGB2YUVTableBuilt ) buildRGB2YUVTable();
00064   for (;!Itarg.end();++Itarg,++Iimage) {
00065     tempR = Iimage->R();
00066     tempG = Iimage->G();
00067     tempB = Iimage->B();
00068     py = TABLE_RGB_TO_PY[ tempR ][ tempG ];
00069     y =  TABLE_RGB_TO_Y[ py ] [ tempB ];
00070     Itarg -> setY( y );
00071     Itarg -> setU( TABLE_RGB_TO_U[ tempB ][ y ] );
00072     Itarg -> setV( TABLE_RGB_TO_V[ tempR ][ y ] );
00073   }
00074 
00075   return targ;
00076 }
